name: Palmer v. McClelland et ux., Appellants

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
parties: Palmer v. McClelland et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Each party to pay own costs.
Mr. Justice Cohen took no part in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: James L. Rankin, with, him Rankin & Rankin, for appellants.
I. B. Sinclair, with him Bell, Pugh, Sinclair and Prodoehl, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Palmer v. McClelland et ux., Appellants.
Argued April 29, 1970.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts and Pomeroy, JJ.
reargument refused February 9, 1971.
James L. Rankin, with, him Rankin & Rankin, for appellants.
I. B. Sinclair, with him Bell, Pugh, Sinclair and Prodoehl, for appellees.
January 7, 1971:
